rules.name: StartPoint_true
rules.conditionLogic: ( 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 ) OR (5 AND 2 AND 3)

rules.name: Under_Offer
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4) OR (1 AND 3 AND 5)
rules.label: Under Offer

rules.name: Status_Under_Approval
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 ) OR (1 AND 2 AND 5)
rules.label: Status Under Approval

formulas.name: FurthestHoursCheck

start.filterLogic: (2 AND (1 OR 3 OR 6)) OR (7 AND (4 OR 5))

textTemplates.name: DirectorNotificationErrorDetails
textTemplates.text: Opportunity : {!$Record.OpportunityNumber__c} which is owned by {!$Record.Owner.FirstName} {!$Record.Owner.LastName}, has been pending approval with {!$Record.Owner.Manager.FirstName} {!$Record.Owner.Manager.LastName} for {!Get_CurrSLA_Action.Number_of_Hours__c} hours
